value.Name: Chicken Rice
value.Steps: 1. In a large skillet, melt 2 Tbsp butter. Add broken pasta and rice. Cook until lightly brown.\n2. Add water and seasonings. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cover.\n3. Cook 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until water is absorbed.

value.Name: Spaghetti Bolognese
value.Ingredients: 1 carrot, 50 grams Celery root, 1 onion, 1 garlic, 50 streaky Smoked bacon
value.Steps:
1.Peel and dice the carrot and celery. Peel the onion and garlic, and finely chop. Cut the bacon into small cubes.
For the sauce, heat the heat oil, saute the onions and garlic and fry the bacon. Add in the vegetables and saute briefly. Add the minced meat in portions and saute until crumbly over high heat, while stirring. Add in the tomato paste, red wine, and pour in the broth. Season with salt and pepper, and stir in the lumpy tomato. Simmer for about 1 hour, stirring occasionally, and maybe add a little broth in between
2.Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al den
3.Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Drain the pasta and transfer to plates. Pour the sauce over and garnish with basil. Serve sprinkled with freshly grated Parmesan.

value.Name: Pizza

1.Peel and dice the carrot and celery. Peel the onion and garlic, and finely chop. Cut the bacon into small cubes.

Add the minced meat in portions and saute until crumbly over high heat, while stirring. Add in the tomato paste, red wine, and pour in the broth. Season with salt and pepper, and stir in the lumpy tomato. Simmer for about 1 hour, stirring occasionally, and maybe add a little broth in between
2.Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al den
3.Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Drain the pasta and transfer to plates. Pour the sauce over and garnish with basil. Serve sprinkled with freshly grated Parmesan.
